Resilio Sync.description:
Fast, private file sharing for teams and individuals.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 architecture only.
Resilio Sync.more_info:
Note about mapping Rockstor Shares

Resilio Sync supports mapping more Shares into the Rock-On via the Add Storage button. But, the Rock-on Directory must be a subdirectory of /mnt/mounted_folders. Eg: /mnt/mounted_folders/Photos. Shares mapped to other directories will not be visible.

55555.description: Port for incoming data. You may need to open it (protocol: udp) on your firewall.
55555.label: Listening port [must be 55555]

/mnt/sync.description: Share for all incoming data, including app state and config. It will be /mnt/sync inside Resilio Sync's Web-UI.
/mnt/sync.label: Data Storage [e.g. resiliosync-data]
